name: moxie
description: This Pokémon's Attack rises one stage upon knocking out another Pokémon, even a friendly Pokémon.  This ability does not take effect when the Pokémon indirectly causes another Pokémon to faint, e.g. through poison or spikes.  If this Pokémon knocks out a Pokémon with mummy, the former's ability will change without taking effect.
short_description: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.
